rule.description: Direct calls to method `html()` often (e.g. in jQuery framework) manipulate DOM without any sanitization and should be avoided. Use document.createElement() or similar methods instead.

message.text: Do not write to DOM directly using jQuery html() method

rule.description: Assignments to [innerHTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/innerHTML)/[outerHTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/outerHTML) properties or calls to [insertAdjacentHTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/insertAdjacentHTML) method manipulate DOM directly without any sanitization and should be avoided. Use document.createElement() or similar methods instead.

message.text: Do not write to DOM directly using innerHTML/outerHTML property
